name: PRETZEL
tagline: Light-weight and portable linear structure playground
body:
### About Pretzel.js
The foremost and primary goal of pretzel is to create a portable and minimalistic webGL visualization framework for 3D linear structures (i.e. biological chromosome). The library also provide a wide variety of utilities to interact with, examine, and simulate the structures in close details. 

### Features
#### High level abstraction

#### Simple and straightforward APIs

#### Simulation and data generator

### Quickstart
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
The project is developed and maintained by Thanh Le (@lexxx233)

### Support & Contact
Having trouble? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact pretzeljsproject@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
